text:
Processions, awareness programmes, distribution of pamphlets on road safety will form part of the “Road Safety Week” to be inaugurated here on Sunday. An exhibition on road safety would be held at the new bus stand here on the inaugural day. C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, N. Subramanian, Minister for Adi Dravidar Welfare, will participate in the inaugural programme. Competitions on various topics related to ‘road safety’ were held and the winners will get prize during the course of the celebrations, according to N. Balagurunathan, Regioinal Transport Officer.

Fisherman’s body found

The body of a fisherman Natarajan (40) with multiple injures was recovered near a channel in Kottaipattinam on Friday. Police who recovered the body have arrested a youth, Mustaffa. Further investigation is on. Fishermen of Kottaipattinam abstained from venturing into sea on Saturday.

Overhead tank commissioned

C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, on Saturday, inaugurated an overhead tank in Annavasal town panchayat. S. Ganesh, District Collector, presided over the function.
title: Road Safety Week
